name: com.unity.transport
description: Unity network transport layer - the low-level interface for sending UDP data

_upm.changelog:
### Fixes
* Fixed a rare issue where a sequence ID collision from ushort overflow in certain very specific conditions can result in an old packet being erroneously returned instead of waiting for a new one, causing corruption.

samples.description: Shows how to build a custom network interface using the INetworkInterface API
Several samples on the basics of jobs, mainthread setups using the Unity Transport
Shows how to use Pipeline stages
Basic sample on how to use Unity Relay with Unity Transport, your project must depend on com.unity.services.relay
Shows how to use pipelines and jobs to gather stats and create traffic using Unity Transport
